Bash(cat /c/dev/feature-uninstall/node_modules/@tauri-apps/cli/config.schema.json | python3 -c "
import json,sys
s=json.load\(sys.stdin\)
nsis=s.get\('definitions',{}\).get\('NsisConfig',{}\)
hooks_prop = nsis.get\('properties',{}\).get\('installerHooks',{}\)
print\(json.dumps\(hooks_prop, indent=2\)\)
" 2>/dev/null)
